forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 65F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
